Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Mantra Midtown places you in the heart of Brisbane, walking distance from Naldham House and St. Stephens Cathedral. This 4.5-star aparthotel is within close proximity of Queen Street Mall and Brisbane Riverside Markets.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 103 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Rooms have private furnished balconies or patios. 40-inch LCD televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a sauna, and a fitness center. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and barbecue grills.

Dining
Grab a bite from a grocery/convenience store serving guests of Mantra Midtown. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, express check-in, and a 24-hour front desk. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Grab a bite from a grocery/convenience store serving guests of Mantra Midtown. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

A stay at Mantra Midtown places you in the heart of Brisbane, walking distance from Naldham House and St. Stephens Cathedral. This 4.5-star aparthotel is within close proximity of Queen Street Mall and Brisbane Riverside Markets.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Naldham House - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
St. Stephens Cathedral - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Queen Street Mall - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Brisbane Riverside Markets - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Brisbane Botanic Gardens - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Eagle Street Pier - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Museum of Brisbane - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
ANZAC Square War Memorial - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
King George Square - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Treasury Casino - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Brisbane Parliament House - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Brisbane City Hall - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Brisbane Customs House - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Queensland University of Technology - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Tower Mill - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi

The preferred airport for Mantra Midtown is Brisbane, QLD (BNE) - 13.1 km / 8.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
